sqlMap.select: SELECT MAINIPADDR, HOSTNM FROM SKT_TOMS WHERE MAINIPADDR = #Ip# AND HOSTNM = #HostName#

SELECT T.TARGET_ID, ST.HOSTNM, ST.MAINIPADDR AS IP, ST.SVCNM, (SELECT U.USER_NO FROM pi_user U WHERE U.user_no = ST.BPINFRAUSERID) AS BPINFRAUSERID, (SELECT U.USER_NO FROM pi_user U WHERE U.user_no = ST.BPAPPUSERID) AS BPAPPUSERID, (SELECT U.USER_NO FROM pi_user U WHERE U.user_no = ST.SKTAPPUSERID) AS SKTAPPUSERID FROM pi_ap_server AP, skt_toms ST LEFT OUTER JOIN pi_targets T ON ST.HOSTNM = T.name WHERE T.AP_NO = AP.AP_NO AND AP.IS_SERVER = 1
